name: Lazy Lover
description: This is a popular Employees Only creation made of cachaça, lime juice, jalapeño-infused green Chartreuse, Benedictine and agave nectar.
keywords: cachaça, green chartreuse, lime juice, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/2 fresh jalapeno, cut into thin wheels

recipeInstructions.text: Place jalapeno in a small saucepan. Add Chartreuse and bring to a boil. Immediately remove from heat, remove jalapeno and allow infusion to cool.
Pour 1/2 ounce of infusion (there will be extra) and remaining liquids into a mixing glass. Shake with ice and strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with thyme.
